summary: This bill, the Capital for Beginning Farmers and Ranchers Act of 2025, amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act. It establishes a pilot program to provide development loans and loan guarantees to beginning farmers and ranchers for capital investments that benefit their farming or ranching businesses, such as infrastructure and equipment. The loans are intended to have flexible terms, with maximums on interest rates and loan amounts, and borrowers will receive training and support. The Secretary of Agriculture is required to evaluate the pilot program and submit biennial reports to Congress.
